### INSTALL ###
IF(CMAKE_HOST_WIN32)
IF(NOT EXISTS "C:/Program Files/Android/Android Studio/bin/studio.exe")
	DKSETPATH(${DIGITALKNOB}/Download)
	## DKDOWNLOAD(www.internet.com/android-studio-ide-173.4670197-windows.exe)
	## DKDOWNLOAD(${DKWEB}/Download/android-studio-ide-173.4670197-windows.exe)
	DKSETPATH(C:/)
	DKSET(QUEUE_BUILD ON)
	ANDROID_COMMAND(${DIGITALKNOB}/Download/android-studio-ide-173.4670197-windows.exe)
ENDIF()
ENDIF()


IF(CMAKE_HOST_APPLE)
IF(NOT EXISTS "/Applications/Android Studio.app")
	DKSETPATH(${DIGITALKNOB}/Download)
	## DKDOWNLOAD(www.internet.com/android-studio-ide-173.4670197-mac.dmg)
	## DKDOWNLOAD(${DKWEB}/Download/android-studio-ide-173.4670197-mac.dmg)
	DKSETPATH(C:/)
	DKSET(QUEUE_BUILD ON)
	## ANDROID_COMMAND(${DIGITALKNOB}/Download/android-studio-ide-173.4670197-mac.dmg)
ENDIF()
ENDIF()


IF(CMAKE_HOST_LINUX)
IF(NOT EXISTS "${DIGITALKNOB}/3rdParty/android-studio/bin/studio.sh")
	DKSETPATH(${DIGITALKNOB}/Download)
	## DKDOWNLOAD(www.internet.com/android-studio-ide-173.4670197-linux.zip)
	## DKDOWNLOAD(${DKWEB}/Download/android-studio-ide-173.4670197-linux.zip)
	DKSETPATH(C:/)
	DKSET(QUEUE_BUILD ON)
	## ANDROID_COMMAND(${DIGITALKNOB}/Download/android-studio-ide-173.4670197-linux.zip)
ENDIF()
ENDIF()
